metadata.name: LA PLACE DE LA FEMME EST DANS LA BLOCKCHAIN
metadata.description:
This artwork was created for the exhibition "I am..." powered by Gxrls Revolution and Jean-Michel Pailhon.

LA PLACE DE LA FEMME EST DANS LA BLOCKCHAIN” is an AI 3D collage. I have combined my 3D collage technique with layers of AI imagery using prompts trained on my own style and practice. 

The artwork takes the viewer on a journey, starting off with what appears to be a traditional collage. As the collage starts to dis-integrate, the concept of a woman’s identity in web3 starts to reveal itself, through the 3D layers and graffiti. This leads round to a techno futuristic plane where the central female figure is replaced by a beautiful metallic AI robot and the notion that a woman’s traditional place will no longer be in the home or kitchen. It will be in the blockchain. 

This message is re-iterated as we finish our journey with the graffiti words “equality is decentralized”. 

I truly believe that women’s empowerment and freedom will come from decentralization.
